resources.string: Welcome to the Official Unloved Device Manager.
Your device is not currently supported. You will have access to some options. Join #oudhitsquad on freenode to request support for a device.
Here you can install, uninstall and change your recovery.
App Developed by: PressY4Pie \n CWM Developed by: koush \n CWM Ported by: to many to count
